scripts.build: node build-fuse.mjs && tsc --noEmit && builder build plugin
scripts.dev: DEVELOPMENT=true node build-fuse.mjs && builder build plugin --no-minify --source-map
scripts.test: cd example && yarn plugin import ../bundles/@yarnpkg/plugin-fuse.js && yarn install && yarn test
scripts.test-deployed: cd example && yarn plugin import $FUSE_PLUGIN_PATH && yarn install && yarn test
